item.description:
Specific Topic: NLP - Back to Basics

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

This month's NLP workshop will be a review or Intro of the basics of NLP -
- History / Players
- Presuppositions
- Fundamentals

and 1 or two basic techniques

This will be great as a refresher (all experienced practitioners are welcome, as well) and great for anyone just getting started.

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
